"Etoile Double Saber":
"When a Double Saber is equipped by an Etoile, it performs \"Etoile Double Saber\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Double Saber attacks.

Etoile Double Saber has high mobility and strong aerial performance, making it effective for aerial combat.

There are many skills that alter its actions, and you can make yourself more effective in battle by choosing the skills that suit your own fighting style."

"When you learn the skill \"Etoile Double Saber Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills as you attack enemies, and when you take damage, Gear will be consumed to reduce the damage you take.

The more you attack, the better your defenses will be, so don't stop fighting."

"In addition, you can consume your Gear to trigger a powerful attack called \"Enhance Attack\".

It's up to you to assess each battle and decide whether to use your Gear for attack or defence.

Enhance Attack
・Hold the normal attack button to consume one unit of Gear and perform a powerful attack.

※If activated with less than 1 unit of Gear, the attack's power will be reduced."

"Etoile Double Saber can block and even Just Guard enemy attacks with its Weapon Action, \"Deflect\".

If you activate Deflect again after blocking an enemy attack, you will perform a powerful Deflect Combo counterattack.

You can activate Deflect Combo by Deflecting multiple times even if you don't get a Just Guard."

"There are many skills which alter the actions available to Etoile Double Saber. Select your skills carefully and customise your Etoile Double Saber actions in a way that fits your fighting style.

Double Saber Step Slide
・During a Step, use Step again to transition into a smooth movement action that lets you control its direction.
※Movement speed increases while locked on."

"Double Saber Skip Arts
・Use a PA while not entering movement input to skip the first half of the PA.

・Using a PA while entering movement input will work the same as if you hadn't learned this skill."

"Double Saber Quick Take
・After a PA or Weapon Action, use a PA or normal attack when the on-screen guide indicates to approach the enemy at high speed and strike.

Double Saber Step Guard
・Step towards an enemy just as they are about to hit you to Just Guard their attack and perform a high-speed counterattack."
